contest-event.event-date:
June 25, 1994 D Northeastern Brass Band Championships
Northeastern Brass Band Championships 0 Set Test and Own Choice
northeastern-brass-band-competition
First contest 1994; final scheduled contest 1996. United States of America
The Plantagenets
United States Military Academy (Thayer Hall), West Point, New York, USA First annual event, organised by Mark Freeh and Mike Orfitelli.
4 bands played. 3 adjudicators. Bands to play a 25 minute programme including the set test piece.
Oct. 13, 2014, 7:53 p.m. Nov. 18, 2014, 11:39 a.m.
1 Imperial Brass Brian Bowen Themes from the Italian Symphony
2 Atlantic Brass Band Anthony Guerere
3 New England Brass Band Bill Rollins
4 Danbury Brass Band Alan Raph
